title: Science Inquiry Skill Enhancement Program Using Collaborative Learning-Based Flip Charts

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science terminology and experimental tool usage methods
context.additional_context: Students access flip-chart media using individual digital devices (tablets/laptops) and focus on visualizing and structuring scientific concepts through small-group collaborative activities

learning_goals: Learners can visually represent and collaboratively explain three or more science concepts using flip charts as a medium.
Applying a cooperative learning framework (e.g., JIGSAW), learners perform role division and knowledge sharing within small groups with over 80% participation.
In summative assessments, learners achieve a 20% or greater improvement in achievement compared to traditional methods when applying flip-chart-based learning.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
